author: brett
msg: Remove customised style to make upgrading between struts versions easier.
Note that one customisation was dropped - forms drop the header backgrounds
(th is now td.tdLabel; class=“b” removed from row)

author: brett
msg: [CONTINUUM-2713] replace desc with after to use default theme

author: brett
msg: Set size instead of using custom template. These could be set more
appropriately, but start with what they were using before.

author: brett
msg: These are not inside forms, so are relying on specific theme layout, when
they should just provide the HTML they expect
